entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Port Carling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 10:57 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.0°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: SSE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
